component.name: Omidot Engine
component.summary: Multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine with a feature-rich editor

description.p: Omidot is an advanced, feature-packed, multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

Omidot is a fork of the Godot Engine Which is under the mit License . for more inforamtion check godot website Godot website.
completely free and open source under the very permissive MIT license. for details check out Godot License.

screenshot.caption: 3D project loaded in the Omidot Engine editor
